Smash Bros Brawl (US)

Disable Custom Stages 1.1 [Phantom Wings]
* 046B841C 48000040

Enable Random Expansion Stages v1.1 [Phantom Wings]:
* C26B7A6C 00000005
* 3860001F 2C120000
* 41820008 3860000A
* 7C101800 41800008
* 38000001 7C800379
* 60000000 00000000
This code causes every stage to be included in the random stage select, regardless of what is selected in the random stage select screen.
You can disable this; in that case, the added stages will not be chosen on Random.

Unrestricted Pause Camera
* 040A7D60 4E800020
* 04109D88 38800001
